entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:49 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
